title: Tiraz Tapestry, 10th–12th century
medium:
Medium: Warp: linen. Wefts; linen in plain weave area, silk in tapestry area.
Technique; plain weave and tapestry
inscribed: Debases inscription; illegible except for the Arabic word for 'God'.
description: Tapestry band in red and beige reaching from one side to the other

tombstone.epitaph:
Tiraz Tapestry, 10th–12th century.
10th–12th century. Medium: Warp: linen. Wefts; linen in plain weave area, silk in tapestry area.
Technique; plain weave and tapestry. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-163.
